title: Chicken & chorizo jambalaya
methods: Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan with a lid and brown the chicken for 5-8 mins until golden.
Remove and set aside. Tip in the diced onion and cook for 3-4 mins until soft.
Add the pepper, garlic cloves, chorizo and Cajun seasoning, and cook for 5 mins more.
Stir the chicken back in with the long grain rice, add the plum tomatoes and chicken stock. Cover and simmer for 20-25 mins until the rice is tender.
description: A healthy Cajun-inspired rice pot recipe that's bursting with spicy Spanish sausage, sweet peppers and tomatoes.
